about.details:
Incorporated in 2014, Wherrelz IT solutions and its subsidiary Infinitybeam IOT Labs Private Limited is engaged in the business of web-centric, multi-spectrum IT Product development and maintenance and provision of IT Consultancy. The company provides a wide range of services such as Enterprise Risk Management (ERM), Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), E-Commerce, Application programming interface (API), Cyber Security, Internet of Things (IoT), cloud-based tools, etc through standard software development model or customized software development model depending upon the requirement of the clients. 

Competitive Strengths:

  • Experienced senior management.
  • Scalable Business Model
  • Broad software engineering capabilities

faqs.question: What is the Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO is a SME IPO of 117600 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹2.01 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹171 per share. The minimum order quantity is 800.

The IPO opens on December 16, 2021, and closes on December 21, 2021.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO opens on December 16, 2021 and closes on December 21, 2021.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO lot size is 800, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,36,800.

faqs.question: How to apply for Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO will be done on Friday, December 24, 2021, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, December 28, 2021. Check the Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Wherrelz IT Solutions IPO listing date is on Wednesday, December 29, 2021.
